classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
================
xhostplus.social
================

This product adds social network buttons to each page. It supports Google+,
Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn. It is configurable which services are
activated.

xhostplus.social comes with optional support for jquery.socialshareprivacy,
developed and distributed by Heise Zeitschriften Verlag GmbH & Co. KG.

Translations
============

This product comes with following languages:

* English
* German

Further translations are welcome.

- Questions and comments to support@xhostplus.at

Changelog
=========

1.4.6 (2013-06-10)
------------------

- Improved German help text in settings for non-austrian users
  [andreas_stocker]
- Using canonical_object_url to determine the current page url
  [andreas_stocker]

1.4.5 (2013-05-29)
------------------

- Do not require PasteScript for installation any more
  [andreas_stocker]

1.4.4 (2013-03-25)
------------------

- Fixed upgrade path from 1.2 to 1.4
  [andreas_stocker]
- Enabled merging of JS files
  [andreas_stocker]

1.4.3 (2012-02-12)
------------------

- Fixed JavaScript to work with IE
  [andreas_stocker]

1.4.2 (2012-11-04)
------------------

- Fixed decode error on non-ascii hashtags
  [andreas_stocker]

1.4.1 (2012-11-03)
------------------

- Re-added permissions for changing social attributes
  [andreas_stocker]

1.4.0 (2012-11-02)
------------------

- Added options to enable/disable services
  [andreas_stocker]
- Added twitter hashtag configuration
  [andreas_stocker]
- Google URL shortener
  [andreas_stocker]

1.2.0 (2012-05-10)
------------------

- Added support for LinkedIn
  [andreas_stocker]
- Using HTML5 compatible buttons
  [andreas_stocker]
- Plone 4.1 compatible
  [andreas_stocker]

1.1.1 (2012-01-03)
------------------

- Remove quotes from cookies before adding value to a JSON string
  [andreas_stocker]

1.1.0 (2011-11-09)
------------------

- Added support for 2-click-buttons
  [andreas_stocker]
- Added OpenGraph description meta tag
  [andreas_stocker]

1.0.0 (2010-03-27)
------------------

- Initial version (not public)
  [andreas_stocker]
info.name: xhostplus.social
info.summary: Displays social buttons (facebook, google+, twitter, linkedin) on the Plone site.
info.html_description:
This product adds social network buttons to each page. It supports Google+, Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn. It is configurable which services are activated.

xhostplus.social comes with optional support for jquery.socialshareprivacy, developed and distributed by Heise Zeitschriften Verlag GmbH & Co. KG.

Further translations are welcome.
